name: Boxing Boxing Boxing
description:
A short attempt to make a first person Dead Rising. Players can punch stuff, pick up stuff, and punch stuff with the things that they pick up.

------------------------------------------------------------

~Controls~

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Flash Jump - Space + leftShift

Punch - Left Mouse/ Right Mouse

Raise Hands - Q or E

Pick Up - LeftMouse/RightMouse + R

Let Go of Left Hand - V

Let Go of Right Hand - B

Let Go of Both Hands - 4

Adjust Mouse Sensitivity - J or K (J lowers sensitivity, K raises sensitivity)

P - Reload Scene
